title: Ticket #6419: Remove integer formatting methods from MyString
description: MyString has an odd set of constructors and operator+= methods that take an integer type and format it into a string representation ala printf(). This has resulted in bugs like #6418. We should remove these methods to avoid such problems. This will make MyString operate more like std::string, which will reduce potential confusion. The new convenience functions IntToStr() are a good substitute for explicit conversion of an integer to a string.
